attributes.action: Amend the Parliament Act so that when the governing political party changes its leader, which results in a change of prime minister then the new prime minister is required to hold a general election within 91 days of taking office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When the governing political party changes is leader which results in a change of prime minster then the new prime minister should be required to hold a general election within 91 days of taking office. In the event that the change is due to sudden serious ill health or death of the previous prime minister then subject to parliamentary approval then the general election can be delayed for 91 days
